message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $110 as the price for the product. This allows me to stay within my budget while still valuing the item.
